lines.line: Wow, this place really is terrible. No wonder you wanted to go back. Though I can’t imagine the world you want would be any better.
At least in my world there would still be society. That damned AI wanted everyone dead.
On IRIS we agree. Although I find it hard to believe that everyone got killed by it.
IRIS was efficient, and quick. Most people didn’t even know what was happening until they were either mind controlled or dead. I barely even realized before the bombs were dropped around the world.
That crafty bitch. When are we, by the way?
I stopped keeping track many millennia ago. I honestly don’t have the faintest clue.
